Components.Abstract.AST2BoxTree

Interface IAST2BoxTreeComp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPAMOJAComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CAST2BoxTreeComp

    public interface IAST2BoxTreeComp
extends IPAMOJAComponent
    Provides services for mapping an AST to a Box tree and for interacting with other components. E.g, AST, Patterns and BoxTree2Stream components.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CBox format(CNode aNode)
      Returns a box tree from a given AST node.
      IASTComp getAST()
      Accesses the interface of the AST component connected to this AST2BoxTree component.
      CBox getBoxTree()
      Get the value of BoxTree
      IPatternsComp getPatterns()
      Accesses the interface of a Patterns object connected to this AST2BoxTree component.
      void setAST(IASTComp aAST)
      Connects to the AST component via its interface.
      void setBoxTree(CBox aBoxTree)
      Set the value of BoxTree and notify observers about BoxTree property changes.
      void setPatterns(IPatternsComp aPatterns)
      Connects to the Patterns component via its interface.

      • Methods inherited from interface Components.IPAMOJAComponent

        addPropertyChangeListener, removePropertyChangeListener

    • Method Detail

      • getAST

        IASTComp getAST()
        Accesses the interface of the AST component connected to this AST2BoxTree component.
        Returns:
        the value of AST

      • setAST

        void setAST(IASTComp aAST)
        Connects to the AST component via its interface. Registers for property change events, retrieves current value of AST object and regenerates the box tree.
        Parameters:
        aAST - new AST component's interface.

      • getPatterns

        IPatternsComp getPatterns()
        Accesses the interface of a Patterns object connected to this AST2BoxTree component.
        Returns:
        the interface of a Patterns object.

      • setPatterns

        void setPatterns(IPatternsComp aPatterns)
        Connects to the Patterns component via its interface. Registers for property change events, retrieves current object of the patterns internal structure and regenerates the box tree.
        Parameters:
        aPatterns - the Patterns component interface.

      • getBoxTree

        CBox getBoxTree()
        Get the value of BoxTree
        Returns:
        the value of BoxTree

      • setBoxTree

        void setBoxTree(CBox aBoxTree)
        Set the value of BoxTree and notify observers about BoxTree property changes.
        Parameters:
        aBoxTree - new value of BoxTree

      • format

        CBox format(CNode aNode)
        Returns a box tree from a given AST node.
        Parameters:
        aNode - the AST node
        Returns:
        the box tree object
